Posts.Content: I’m new to the site ... just had my results after a WLE and sentinel node biopsy, devestated that I have to have chemo but know it could of been worse ... seems to effect everyone differently.. worried about everything but trying to be positive but also realistic & get me & family prepared for my first cycle in a week and half time. does anyone have top tips to get thru the first one ?
Posts.Title: FEC-T side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks Carolyn ... have been reading up on things but it does seem to be different for everyone, thanks for the heads up about the length of time it takes ! Did You take anything for the loo issues ? Did you take time off work ? I’m planning getting rid of my hair before the first cycle and hoping it comes back better than it is now ! How are you now ?  Xx
Posts.Title: FEC-T side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks very much, really good advice ! How many cycles do you have? Hope you have help with your boys, I have two myself but luckily have my other half to help but I’m trying to stock up on things and try to show them all what to do if I can’t! Hope your next one goes ok x
Posts.Title: FEC-T side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks Carolyn .. my boss is sympathetic but he seems to think I’ll breeze thru it and come in but I will mention the chemo fog as I have read about that and I need to be able to multitask at work and if that’s not possible it will be a real problem ... will have to see how day two goes ! I had the codine phosphate after surgery and it made me itch like mad! I’m planning on shaving my hair before I start as I don’t think I can handle afterwards on top of feeling crap ..hubs has agreed to do it for me he doesn’t talk about it much not sure if it’s a bit of denial of that he doesn’t want to upset me.. I’ll have to get some lollies in! Xx
Posts.Title: FEC-T side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks ! It’s really encouraging to know we can get thru this, it’s the being different for everyone is what I’ve found the hardest tbh, trying to find out what to expect is a minefield of info, I like to be prepared and not being in control is a bit scary  ! Xx
Posts.Title: FEC-T side effects
